1211121222212111.content:
You think on it, but only briefly before you shake your head. She may have sounded honest, more honest than you'd ever heard her, you thought, but that wasn't enough to forgive her. Besides...

"...Also, if you show me to her, she'd probably take me, and I already agreed to go home with you." Though at first you were uncertain about that course of action, when caught between April and a hard place, you'd choose Emily all day long.

Emily shook her head defiantly. "I no wan' lose you Dani!"

Before you could answer, a knock at the bathroom door caused your heart to jump to your throat, and judging by how Emily's normally gentle grip tightened suddenly, it spooked her too.

"Emily? Did you see Daniel in there?" Three rapid knocks sounded against the door once more. You slapped the top of her fist, not only to draw her gaze, but also hopefully to loosen her grip. As she looked down at you, you shook your head violently while crossing your neck with your free hand. Emily looked up and down between you and the door, her 4-year-old mind racing as fast as it ever had.

BANG BANG BANG, "Emily? Are you in there? Hello?"

She looked down at you once more, completely uncaring of your current size, she recognized you as the elder, as well as knowing you held the answer to getting out of this situation.

You whisper-shouted it, though with your diminutive size April may not have heard it if you screamed bloody murder. "Just say no! Say you're almost done!"

"Uh, um, I a'most no! Done-uh!"

You slapped your forehead at Emily's confusion of the two statements, but April's response generated a much more pressing concern than proper sentence conjugation.

"OK, once you come out can you help me look for him? I'll wait for you here!" Her voice twanged with the slightest bit of concern and worry, but you didn't notice it.

"Emily! You have to hide me, remember!?"

Emily toddled toward the tub and held you close to her mouth, whispering warm, wet wind past your face and into your ears. "I no know wewe hide!"

Ignoring her close proximity as best you could, the memory of her mouth being too fresh for you liking, you continued, panicked. "Hide me in your pockets!" She tilted her head, confused. "Your pants!"

"Umm...." She pressed you against her skirt, rubbing you up and down. What the heck, where are the pockets?

The knocked caused both you and her, though to much different degrees, to jump. "Emily? Are you OK? Do you need help?"

"Uh, no, I, I done...." She looked down to you and held her free hand to her mouth as she saw you non-verbally screaming "NO!"

"OK, well come on out, we need to find my brother fast!"

"What I do, Dani? I no know wewe hide..."

Crapcrapcrapcrap you thought, there's no time. The only two places that would work would be her mouth, but you didn't want to repeat that. The only other place would be....
1211121222212111.title: Hide from April

choices: Well, he should pass through OK...
12111212222121111.content:
The lock to the bathroom door gives way with a *snap!* that splits the air between you and Emily. Before you can shout something, anything, her palm flies to her mouth, throwing you in the back of her humid, hot maw. What air there is is heavy and wet, and smells of old apples. There's barely enough space, as her tongue lolls nervously underneath you, the soggy carpet causing you to roll over yourself on the smooth muscle.

"Finally, now Emily, we have to... Emily?" She looked curiously at her baby cousin standing still at the corner of the bathroom, facing the wall.

Emily held her beloved cousin Daniel in her mouth, feeling him on her tongue. The feeling was indescribable, especially to her toddler mind. Before she could think on it too much, a hand touched her shoulder, causing her to jump.

April continued to stare as Emily jolted around to face her. The most noticeable thing about her was her mouth, closed, but open on the inside. April knew the look, knew the feeling, it was like when she'd try to pretend to eat a veggie and spit it out later, but looking at it from this angle, it was no surprise her parents saw right through it. "Emily, what's in your mouth?" Her blonde curls swayed as she shook her head, not saying anything. "Emily."
She shook again, this time "uh-uh"ing through her closed lips. April was finding her patience quickly tested. "Open-your-mouth!" She growled as her hands sought to pry open her lips.

Emily fought off her older cousin as best she could, desperate to protect the precious cargo in her mouth. As she fought, she slipped, landing butt first on the floor. Gulping reflexively, she coughed, rubbing her throat as a large bulge visibly made its way down. Feeling around with her tongue, she felt nothing. Desperate, she began pawing the floor, tossing aside the bathmat in a frantic search for her beloved cousin as April looked on, still thoroughly confused. Emily felt something move inside her tummy, and as she touched it, she knew then just what had transpired. Tears began to roll down her cheeks as her hands awkwardly rubbed them away. "NO!"

April stood aback, before she tentatively stepped forward. "...Geez, did you swallow one of your toys? Why were you hiding it from me, I don't want your stinky toys-" She pulled away again as another wail escaped Emily. Geez, she thought, how was Daniel so good with that baby? She tried to soothe her as well as she could. "Um, there there... It's OK, it should... Come out on its own."
Emily continued sobbing, but finally spoke. "Dan- *hic!* Dani- *sob* WAAAAH!"
April cocked her head. Dani? Daniel? The pieces finally snapped together. The awkwardness, the hiding, of course Daniel would go to Emily! April kicked herself for not realizing it sooner.
"You mean- you ate Daniel!?" Emily continued to cry, but nodded her head. April looked to the four-year-old's stomach.

121112122221211112.content:
"Oh my God, Daniel!" April quickly turned her hysterical cousin around and, in an impressive imitation of the Heimlich maneuver, began to knead on Emily's stomach. Emily's crying quieted down, but tears still streaked her puffy cheeks as she sobbed to April. "Owie! Apwil, tat huwts!"
April ignored her pleas, intent on rescuing her brother. "Emily, think of gross things, think of ewwy things, like veggies, or boogers, or your diaper when it's really poopy!"
Emily continued to cry, her stomach beginning to bruise. "I can't, I can't, it huwts! Pwe-e-ease, it huuuwts!" April acquiesced this time, releasing her grip from the toddler's belly. Emily fell to her knees, holding her stomach. April, inspired by the act, moved to her front and throwing her arms away, she yelled at her belly. "Daniel! Hey, Daniel! Can you hear me?"
Quickly discarding Emily's shirt, she tossed it carelessly away and put her ear to the smooth, flat surface.

It was like being vacuum-sealed and squeezed on all sides as you were scrunched up in the fetal position and being worked down the wet, slick tube. It took longer than you thought it would, and during the entire time there was nothing but the darkness and your own anticipation, until finally you fell, receiving a one-of-a-kind baptism. Keeping your eyes shut, you stood up, rubbing your eyes free of the slightly acidic substance. Whether it was just her youth or her diet, her stomach acid was not very strong, lucky for you. Splashing through the mess in the complete darkness, you ran into a wall and began pounding on it. From there, various vibrations shook you as Emily cried, then the wall knocked you backwards as April tried to force Emily to vomit you. After the baby cousin stomach wave pool had died down, you once again took your feet, a little dizzier than before. If not Emily, you felt the urge to upchuck, but for her sake you kept the contents of your stomach out of her stomach.
As you processed the thought of stomach-ception, a muffled, but familiar voice sounded in front of you.
You made your way as close as you could and hesitated, but if she was calling you by name, the jig was up. You could choose to stay in Emily's stomach, but... You shook your head. There were lengths you were willing to go to, her mouth, her diaper, but this...
"Daniel! Daniel, please! Please be alright, please!" There was a tremor in her voice that you could hear even through the young flesh of your cousin. What a weird feeling, you mused. Emily is all around me. I'm... Inside of her. You wondered what it looked like from the outside- probably nothing, you were so small. The more you thought on it, the less of a bad idea it seemed. It was crazy, but everything was crazy. Getting shrunk will do that. Stay in Emily's stomach... It was the one place where April couldn't reach you, no matter what she did. Even if she told your parents, they wouldn't believe her, why would they? Although, realistically speaking, you wouldn't be here forever... And after failing to throw you up, the only other way is... Well, you did consider hiding in her diaper, right?

1211121222212111121.content:
You finally answer April, shouting as loudly as you can so she can hear. "I'm OK, I'm OK. But tell Emily that, tell her she didn't hurt me."

April heaved a sigh of relief as her ear rested on the shuddering belly of Emily, still sobbing at having accidentally made a morsel of her cousin. "Thank goodness, he's OK..." April looked up to Emily. "He's OK Emily, he's still alive." The girl choked back her tears.

"Weally? Dani OK?" She groped at her protruding baby belly and forced her head as close as she could to it. "Dani? You OK in my belly?"

The voice was distorted, but still unmistakably hers, even echoing from outside and inside her body. Shouting as loud as you could into the dark, you comforted her. "Yeah Emily, I'm OK."

April spoke up at this point, interjecting between the moment between- and inside-out of them. "OK, it's great that you're alright, but we need to get you out of there before that changes."

"Emily began blubbering again. "I no know how...."

"Emily!" You shouted again. April put her ear to her stomach again. "It's OK Emily, I'm actually going to stay here for a while."

"You're what!?" April shrieked. "You do know what happens to food, right? Things that get eaten, like you did? They get turned into poop. You're going to turn into poop then she's going to poop you in her diaper and then you're going to get thrown into the trash, you... You... You stupid-head!" Emily bawled anew upon hearing the tirade.

"No! I no wanna make Dani into poop! I wuv Dani, no poop Dani!"

Some rapid steps resounded through the house as your and April's mother rushed into the room. Upon taking in the scene, she rushed in to console Emily and scold April. "April! Don't be mean to your cousin! Honestly, you could learn a thing or two from Daniel..." Upon hearing your name Emily wails anew, causing her mother to gently bounce her in response, shaking you like a cocktail.

"But Mom! She *ate* Daniel!"

"Oh come now, that's what's got her so upset? No wonder she's so sad, pretending she ate her best friend, how utterly mean of you! That's enough of that young lady, off to your room."

"No, Mom really, she-"

"Room, now!"

April began to protest, but being cowed by her mother's steely gaze, she threw her hands to her side defeated, and marched off, face burning with tears.

Inside, you rubbed Emily's stomach wall as soothingly as you could, hoping that, even though tiny and from a... Unique place, she would feel you. Not quite shouting, but speaking aloud, you hoped to get her attention without cluing in your mother to the truth.

"Emily! Emily, can you hear me?"

Emily answered with what was a whisper to you. "Dani? You OK? I no wanna poo-poo you.."

You had been standing in her stomach for a while now, and although you felt your clothes were probably ruined, you felt fine. "I'm OK, really. This is actually the best place, April can't separate us this way." Thinking on it, you needed to distract her, she thought she did a naughty thing, you had to work her through that. "It was smart thinking, swallowing me, you're so clever! I'm proud of you!" That was it, make this out to be a positive. How April had such a hard time with Emily was beyond you, it came easy. Probably cuz' she's a big, stupid jerk.

"Dani... Dani liked be eated?"

You cringed a bit. That... Made sense how she came to that conclusion. "Well, let's not do it all the time." Or ever again, you whispered to yourself. "Um, Emily, about how I'm going to get out of here..."

She groped her belly as much as she could to better speak to you. "I no know how, Apwil alweady twy." Thankfully she wasn't crying about it this time, as you had assuaged her guilt over that.

"That's OK Emily, you don't have to try, you just have to go."

"No! Dani, I no poo you! You- you can stay in dewe fowevah, I dwink and eat, and you dwink and eat..."

"Emily! It's OK, I'll be OK. You just have to go."

She spoke again, almost too quiet to hear. "...I no wan huwt you..."

You put your hand to her. "You wont. You never would, I trust you, Emily."

"O-OK...." The titanic toddler finally relaxed, all of the tension leaving her abdomen. As it did so, her stomach finally began to filter the contents, of which you were the main part, down. Before you were taken below, you shouted one last thing.

"Remember to not do it in the potty-!"

No no no, I can't believe this, you thought. Were you really so desperate to avoid April that you'd play pacifier again? You opened your mouth to tell her to put you in, before an idea formed. Too frenzied to consider the craziness of it, you spat it out.

"Emily, do you have to go to the bathroom?"

Emily cocked her giant head. "No... Shood I?"

You shook your head vigorously. "No, Emily, I need you to put me in..." You gulped. This is better than being April's doll, this is better than being April's doll, this is better than being April's doll.... You finally worked up the courage to say it. "...Your diaper."

Emily scrunched her nose and drew away slightly. "Dani no, dat ewwy! No ewwy Dani!"

"You have to, or else April will take me away from you? Do you want to lose me? I want to stay with you, Emily, you have to." Arguing to be stuffed in your cousin's diaper. When you thought back on this as a memory, you'd hardly believe it.

Emily's large green eyes moistened slightly as she whined. "I no wan lose you...." Looking down, she gasped, and pulled open the front of her diaper, skirt and all. Holding her breath, she looked upwards as you hovered over the yawning pit. What normally only pee and poop went into you were about to enter, and it would be your salvation. Before you could take in too much detail, you stomach dropped as your giantess cousin's fingers released you, sending you down. Instead of screaming, gasping, or trying to catch yourself, you instead concentrated on that one act.

Funny that she held her breath when I'm the one going in.

Bouncing on the crinkly plastic, you slid down into her cream-white skin. There was an odd mound with a slit in it, but no pee-pee. Before you could think too much on it, you were slammed into Emily's soft and, at present, clean skin, as the door whined as April entered.

"There you are Emily, what took you?" Emily didn't answer, instead trying to process that her beloved cousin, her elder, her friend, was in her diaper. "Emily?"

She jumped, which would've bounced you if she were wearing a looser diaper. As it were, you were near vacuum-sealed to her hips.

"U-uh-huh, I OK, I big giwl, I pe- po- um, I...." She slapped the front of her diaper reflexively, hitting you once or twice, but causing more discomfort than harm. "I OK! Wets go fin Dani!"

April looked at her slightly concernedly, but shook her head. Babies, will she even be able to help? Maybe this was a stupid idea.... "Yeah... I'll look around the house, you look in my room, OK?"

Agreeing, her thoughts fixated on you. You tried to remain calm, but at the same time couldn't help but squirm. It was incredibly tight, and smelled a bit like your pee-pee when you hadn't bathed for a while. After April guided Emily to her room to search, she began to scour the other rooms of the house for you, unknowing you were under her cousin's nose the whole time. And belly. And skirt. And diaper.

12111212222121212.content:
Sorry about the correction, but all instances of "April" last chapter were actually Emily. Consider this the correction.

Katie, Megan, and Claire. 2, 3, and 5, respectively. You knew them, but of all of them, Emily was your favorite, as well as her favorite. As she had mentioned, Claire you had little to no interaction with, but apparently that was because she was shy, not because she disliked you. Katie you knew the best, as she would throw things at you, blow raspberries, and be a general brat, but according to Emily that was because she was scared of you, not because she necessarily hated you... The thought reminded you of the stupid saying, "the *insert dangerous animal* is more scared of you than you are of it". Best to avoid her either way anyway. Emily was probably the gentlest, kindest 4-year-old in the universe, and you were unbelievably lucky for it, but if she were two than even that would likely not have been enough to save you from a terrible fate, no matter how unintended. 2-year-olds aren't good for toy's health, especially so for toy-sized people!
Shaking yourself from the potential plethora of terrible things Katie would do if she got her hands on you, you thoughts centered on the last. Megan you had seen, but didn't know much about. Apparently if any of them were to discover you, it would be her. The 3-year-old seemed to be the wildcard. You had seen her, but interacted even less with her than you did Claire.

You thought to ask about Megan as well, but you decided against it. She may be gentle and kind, but she was still 4, and you didn't want to confuse her. Besides, if everything goes well, you thought, I'll never know what she's like, and I'll be better off for it.

As the thought concluded, you couldn't help but feel a pit form in your stomach, as if you knew you'd end up in a set of hands not belonging to Emily before the...

You paused. "Emily, how long until you visit Mom?"

Emily cocked her head curiously. "Hm? You want to see Mommy? She might take you away, that's not safe I think-"

You cut her off. 4 years old, you reminded yourself. I willingly chose to ride along with a 4-year-old to a house filled with three more girls, each of them younger than me. Considering for a moment if it was worth it, you felt your limbs being pulled and your body effortlessly moved into positions you didn't want it to as you re-experienced the vivid memory of April easily toying with you. Shuddering you assured yourself that this was the right choice.

"Sorry, Aunty. My Mom, not yours. When do you think you'll visit Aunty and April again?"

"Oh. Um..." She scratched her medium length brown hair. "I dunno. Usually we just go. Mom said, 'let's visit your cousins!' and so we did. ...Don't tell me you want to go back already, you just got here! Don't worry, I'll hide you from my sisters...."

Somehow you knew things wouldn't be that easy, but this was the bed you made, it was time to sleep in it. Speaking of...

"So Emily, you said you'd take care of me, but how exactly will you..." Looking around, the room wasn't as pink as you imagined it. There were a lot of colors actually, many bright ones, "warm" colors, you were taught. Red, yellow, and white. It was actually cleaner than your room, but that was probably because her Mom still cleaned up after her.

"Well, I... Um, I'll keep you close, and, um, I'll feed you, I'll sneak some dinner away. After that, we can sleep together...

You balked at that. "Whoa whoa whoa, we can't do that! You're too big!"

She harrumphed. "It'll be fine, I sleep with stuffed animals all the time-"

"I'm not a stuffed animal!" You shouted. Emily gasped, taken aback. You cringed, seeing that you were too forceful. "I'm sorry Emily, I'm sorry. Please. I-I'm not a stuffed animal though. I'm a person, I'm your cousin. And you could hurt me in your sleep."

"N-no I wouldn't! I would never-!"

"Emily. Remember why I agreed to come with you? You said you'd do what I say. You can't sleep with me, you're too big."

She began to protest, but hung her head. She did promise. "...Who knew taking care of tiny people would be so hard..."

You're telling me!? You almost shouted.

"Girls, time to eat! Come on down!" Your aunt called from the kitchen, and your stomach growled in response. Emily answered.

"Coming Mommy!" She looked back to you. "Um, so I can take you with me in my pocket and sneak you some crumbs, or you can hide here until I get back..."

Technically, the dinner table would be the most dangerous place. Even being close to Emily, you would also be close to her sisters too. Staying here would probably be safer, but without Emily, if something did happen....

12111212222121221212122212.content:
"So, do you think he's OK in there?"

Emily walked her doll over to Megan's to hug. The two embraced, as Emily spoke up. "He should be. I was a bit worried when Katie held him, but he didn't even wake up!"

After Megan's doll finished reciprocating the hug, she stepped back. "Yeah, Dan-Dan's amazing! Katie no hurt him!"

Claire tilted her head in thought. Katie was usually a little sweetie, but every now and again... "Maybe I ought to check on him."

Emily's doll turned toward Claire, leaning back to look up at her. "Hey, Dani said he'd spend her nap with her! You can't take him for yourself!"

Megan's doll imitated Emily's. "Yeah, no take Dan-Dan!"

Claire addressed the doll's holders. "I'm not going to take him for myself, I'm just worried. How would you feel if after all the promises..." She addressed that specific word at Emily, causing her to look downcast. "...We made Daniel that we wouldn't hurt him, and Katie does by accident in her sleep?"

Emily's doll imitated her master. "...Bad..."

Megan's followed. "...We promise we no hurt Dan-Dan..."

Claire felt a little bad, so she put some cheer in her voice. "I'm sure he's fine, I'm just making sure, that's all. I'll be right back, and everything will be fine, you'll see."

The two dolls glanced at each other as Claire stood up, and began making her way to Katie's room. She was able to make her way across the floor easily due to the presence of the night-light, however it didn't illuminate the inside of the crib as much as she needed.

"Daniel! Daniel, are you there?" She whispered, careful not to wake Katie. After hearing no response, she gently ran her fingers around the crib. Maybe he wanted to get away from her... She thought. After finding nothing but cloth, she began to get a bit nervous. Whispering once more, and again receiving no response, she oh-so gently began patting down Katie, her shirt, carefully opening her hands, and still finding nothing.

She gulped. She stared at the pacifier, she couldn't remove that without waking her, and Claire inadvertently found herself wondering if he could even survive that...

She shook her head. No, no! He can't be! He can't! Seeing Katie stir slightly, she realized. He must be underneath her, he has to be. Gently scooping her fingers under her baby sister's shoulder, she began to fit her other fingers under the diaper, and pulled away feeling the dampness.

"Ew!" She whispered as loud as she could. It was really wet, she needed a change. Great, guess finding Daniel will come next...

Grabbing a diaper, she peeled away the straps as quietly as she could. If she wakes, she wakes though, and at least then she'll be able to say where he went.

Peeling the front off, a dark, discolored log fell forward onto the front of the diaper resting on the crib bedding. Barely managing to keep her hands from flying to her mouth, she let out a string of "ew ew ew ew!"s. How did a poop even get there?

As she was about to pull the diaper out from under Katie, the mass moved, then groaned. Claire was halfway between vomiting and squishing it in the diaper before it tried to stand up. Her eyes widened.

"Daniel!?" She spoke aloud. Katie murmured and kicked her legs, now free of the constricting wear, as Daniel took to his feet.

Claire, grabbing the clean diaper meant for Katie, pinched Daniel in it, unwilling to touch him after where he had been. All but running to the bathroom, she left her youngest sister naked in the crib in order to hear what happened.

"....And that's how I ended up there." The last of the suds were washed away as Daniel had been cleaned up, clothes and all. Claire did her best to keep from giggling, or outright laughing. She had been terrified for his safety, that was valid fear, but after hearing him affirm that he was alright made all the tension turn to humor.

Swallowing her giggles as best she could, she responded. "I'm so sorry that happened- *heh* um, *cough*. I was surprised that you accepted to sleep with her, honestly." Claire was legitimately surprised, it wasn't a lie that Katie held him without hurting or even waking him while he slept, but still.

Daniel looked away, fanning his shirt to get it to dry faster. "...Well, I never expected this. When I agreed to come with Emily, it was under the condition she keep me hidden from all of you, and that she do as I say when it came to my safety. When that went out the window though, I..." He trailed off. After a pause of silence, he sighed, and continued. "...I realized, planned or not, this is how it's gonna be for a while. Maybe... Forever. It's like a cold pool. You just have to jump in and get it over with." Even Claire could hear the cracking in his voice. Feeling confident that he was clean enough, she leaned her chest onto the counter and hugged him.

The laughter gone now, replaced with sympathy, she spoke with a kindness, like her sisters, that was beyond her years. "I'm so sorry. But we'll take care of you, and never let you get hurt. Promise."

You were holding back tears as you spoke. Whatever you'd done to deserve this fate, being so small, and so helpless to the degree a toddler peed on you and didn't even notice, you were sorry for it, and were fairly certain that you'd paid your dues.

Maybe that's why I have them though... You thought wiping your tears into Claire's shirt. She gently lifted you, still pressed against her chest, but let her hand fall flat so you had space to stand.

"I need to finish Katie's change, so I'm gonna leave you with Emily and Megan. Unless of course you'd like to help me finish up?" She giggled good-naturedly as she walked past the room your diapered warden accidentally waterboarded you.

It was an obvious joke, you knew that, but as the doorway began to shrink as the distance increased, you found yourself wondering, was it so absurd?

121112122221212212121222122.content:
Claire stopped and paused, perhaps five feet away from the doorway to Katie. She looked down.

"Hm? Sorry, I didn't hear you. Did you say something?"

You spoke up once again. "Actually..."

Claire furrowed her brow. What? What does he mean, 'actually'? As she continued to stare down at you for a few more seconds, her brow unfurrowed and her eyes slowly widened.

"No. Daniel, no! I'm so sorry, that was just a stupid joke, I didn't mean it, I was just kidding, honest! Oh, I knew I shouldn't have said anything, sometimes I make jokes around my sisters and they don't think I'm joking and they begin to cry and I feel awful, oh, please don't cry, I didn't mean it, honest!"

You began waving your hands to calm her down. "No, I know it was a joke. But actually, it wouldn't be a bad thing, overall."

It sounded crazy. Heck, if you from yesterday could see yourself now, you'd think you'd gone nuts. It wasn't insanity driving your words though, it was gratitude.

"You've done so much for me, all of you. I don't want to be a burden."

Claire shook her head, holding her hands flat as still as she could. "Daniel, don't say that! You could never be a burden! Listen, you know that Emily adores you. She talks about you all the time, and you're her favorite reason for visiting Aunty. She'd probably live at your house if she could, this is a dream come true for her. Megan's always been curious about you, but she felt that Emily had all of your attention, so she never tried to talk. And Katie? She's scared of boys, but the second she held you in her hand, her eyes lit up and she smiled so big. As for me..." She smiled. "I always have to be the big sister, so it's fun, at the least just watching you, knowing that you're older than me. Knowing that if there's anything I couldn't do, I can come to you. So please, don't think of yourself as a burden."

Claire's speech had the opposite effect. It didn't make you feel bad, in fact, it convinced you even more. You would contribute as much as if you were normal, or d-, well, you'd try really hard, darn it!

"Claire, this is for me, really. I feel like a burden, I want to help with whatever I can."

Claire relaxed herself, and took a deep breath, causing cool wind to rush behind you and warm wind to blow you back. "OK. I don't really understand, but OK. But, changing Katie's diaper is a bit much, don't you think...?"

You shook your head. "Cold pool. Just have to jump in."

Claire gulped on your behalf, but relented to your self-assurance. "W-well, it's almost done anyway, but..." She shook her head to psyche herself up, to prepare herself for the potentially terrible outcome that might await her tiny charge. "OK. Well, have you ever changed a diaper before? Y'know, when you were big?"

You stopped. No, you hadn't. But... "I have seen Emily's diaper get changed. Sometimes she wanted to hold my hand."

"Well, I'll show you for this time around." She tip-toed into Katie's room, still sleeping peaceably, despite her lower half still naked and exposed. As Claire approached, your eyes began to sting as you covered your nose. The smell of Katie's pee had worsened in the time you had been gone, somehow being worse than when you were swimming in it. Claire didn't twitch, as she gently plopped you on the bedding, the wooden cage reaching for the glow-in-the-dark stickers on the ceiling. Looking forward, you meeped at Katie's bare butt and crotch towering over you. You had climbed it when she was wearing a diaper, but it was easily 4 times your height! Claire waved at you and put a finger to her lips, whispering.

"OK, I did the first part already, but you have to undo the straps here," She wiggled two flaps, visible only due to the night-light. "Then you pull it out, like this." She did so, the disposable fabric making a "vrrt!" sound to you as it rubbed against the crib mattress. "Then you have to wipe her pee off, and poo too, or else it gets bad." She took a rag and rubbed around Katie's crotch and legs, causing the tyke to giggle as one of her hands rubbed her eyes. With a large, cute yawn, Katie began to sit up, just as Claire finished. As she looked around, she saw you just out of reach of her feet.

"Gud mornig, Dani!" She smiled as waved down at you, as you stared at her private area. There was no pee-pee, it was different from yours. So how did she pee? In the darkness you couldn't see the slit, but other things were outlined in a slight, warm light.

Claire answered her. "Good morning Katie-pie, I'm almost done changing you!" She thought about saying that Daniel was helping, but that might excite Katie too much, as well as create 'expectations'.

"Dani! You seep gud? Sowwy for pee..." She paused, before curling up and hiding her face in her hands. "...No no no, Dani seep wiff me and I pee in fwont of him..."

On me, actually, you corrected in your head.

Claire soothed the 2-year-old. "It's OK sweetie, Daniel understands, now, go ahead and lay back, I just need to get this new diaper on you...."

The rest of the change was uneventful, and you felt that you learned how to change a diaper, at normal size. At your current size, it would be hard, if not outright impossible to do the whole thing solo.

Katie was playing with Megan, leaving you with Claire and Emily. Claire had asked them to play by themselves for a bit, but assured them they'd be able to play with you soon after they had a talk. Emily covered her mouth as Claire finished telling the story, the whole story, the one you told Claire plus your decision to try to help change Katie.

"Daniel! You're amazing, being peed on and being OK, then asking to change her! Actually..." Her eyes narrowed as you looked at you with a twinkle of mischief in her eye. "...You've been wanting to spend a lot of time around Katie. First you agree to nap with her, then even after she pees on you, you want to change her diaper? I'm starting to feel a bit jealous."

It was true, you realized. Why were you so eager to be around Katie so much?

1211121222212122121212221221.content:
You scratched the back of your head and chuckled. "Heh, uh, I guess you have a point, actually. I didn't really think about it."

Emily looked expectantly at you. "And?"

"And what? Really, it was just a coincidence. Are you trying to get me to say something?"

Emily sat back, deflated. "Pff. Boys..." Claire giggled, you were just confused, but decided not to press further.

"Speaking of, I did 'nap' with Katie, and went through all of that, so, I'm a little worn-out. Would it be alright if I didn't play for a bit, just relaxed?"

Emily pouted, pushing out her bottom lip. "Daniel, please! I was so excited to play with you!"

Claire responded. "Emily, you heard his story, he's been through a lot. Even if it was mostly self-inflicted..." You looked up at her. Not only a big word, but a harsh truth. C'mon, man.

You spoke up. "I don't mind just talking, but I think I'm all played-out right now. Claire, if it's OK, would you mind if I just talked with Emily for now?"

Claire nodded her head. "OK, I'll entertain Megan and Katie. They're probably desperate to play with you right now. She gently tilted her hand, allowing you to slide off, feet kissing the ground, and supporting your own weight. After backing away a bit, she took to her feet, the rush of air generated from the action felt even at the distance, before waving goodbye. Emily sat cross-legged in front of you, slightly apprehensive, worrying that you were going to scold her for something.

"...Why do you still wear diapers?"

Emily balked. "W-what does that have to do with anything!? Are you making fun of me Daniel?"

"No, no!" You assured her. "I'm just curious, I mean, you're already 4, and you haven't wet the bed in a while from what I've heard. To be honest, I'm just making conversation."

"Well, if you have to know, it's because they're comfier. That, and..." She looked toward her lap. "Claire works so hard for all of us. She's like our mommy when Mommy is away. I... I like being taken care of." You nodded your head, Claire had told you as much earlier, at least about responsibilities of the eldest.

"Now it's my turn to ask you a question." She smiled wide.

"O-OK, though I've answered a few already, I think..."

She shook her head. "So, what was it like- *pfft!* what was it like in Katie's diaper-" She just finished the word before breaking down in a fit of giggles. You only sighed.

"Really, Emily? What do you think?"

She covered her mouth, trying to hold back laughter. "I don't know, I've never been inside a diaper. Well, I guess I'm inside this one, but that doesn't count. So, I've never been tiny and in someone else's diaper while they wear it- *snrkt!* and use- *tee hee* it!." The giggles returned as she fell to her side with joy. She almost made it through the whole sentence, how loved you are.

"Fine. It wasn't fun, obviously. I was bored and just walking around Katie's crib, and when I went to climb her again, she rolled over me, then peed, then stuffed me in. If not for the pee, it may not have been so bad, but it was wet, and smelly, and I thought I was gonna drown!" Emily's laughter died down as she heard your tone of voice.

"OK OK, that was mean. You asked about my diaper, so I thought I'd ask you something embarrassing."

So that's why. "I didn't mean to embarrass you, you know I'd never make fun of you Emily."

Emily held her hands out in front of you, flat. You looked up, eyebrow raised.

"May I... May I please hold you Daniel?" It was hard to say no to that.

"Sure, Emily." You carefully climbed into her hands. It was difficult to keep your balance on the pudgy surface, but once you were fully off the ground, your cousin brought you to her clothed chest, holding you in her lap.

"I love you Dani."

"I love you too, Em." She glanced down and giggled at the nicknames.

"So, speaking of diapers..."

"Emily..."

"No, really. Do you want to practice changing diapers?"

You looked at her, then down as your face became heated. "To be honest, yes. I really do want to help out, not just be taken care of like I'm completely helpless."

1211121222212122121212222.content:
He decided that he might as well try his luck and wake up Katie. He thought about the best way to do so, and moved over to her head. He began whispering at her, but she didn't react at all. Even when he started speaking up and shouting, she kept sleeping. She was obviously deep in sleep, and wouldn't be woken up easily.

He started poking her, and that got a reaction out of her. Unfortunately, that reaction was Katie moving her hand instinctively towards her face, right at him! The hand pressed him against the little girl's face, and the shrunken boy squirmed. His efforts did nothing, though, and the hand remained there, pushing him into the girl's face as she began to stir. She moaned slightly in her sleep, and her fingers began to curl around the boy, forming into a fist that tightly held him.

"Katie!" he shouted, and the girl began to seemingly wake up now. He breathed a sight of relief when he saw one of her big eyes open slowly, followed by the other as Katie slowly sat upright. The boy was brought up to her face, and she raised up her other hand to wipe the sleep from her half-closed eyes.

"Hi," the boy said. Katie smiled slightly, and said hi back.

"What... What you want?" she asked, still half-asleep

"Oh, well.... I was getting a bit bored... I was wondering if you wanted to play with me?" the boy smiled nervously. He now realized that it was probably a little bit of a bad idea to wake up the girl and actually ask to be manhandled, but it was too late to turn back now.

Katie stared at him, and finally decided...

12111212222121221212122221.content:
Katie's eyes fluttered as she roused herself fully to consciousness.

"Ho-kay!" She smiled wide, fully awake now. Wasting no time, she began walking you as if you were a doll, bouncing you up and down against the crib bedding. Sitting cross-legged, she walked you up to her large thigh, close to her diaper, and held you sideways, repeating the same motion as she "walked" you over her leg and into the middle of her open lap. Pausing for a moment, her fingers released, allowing you to take in a bit of air you had held.

It was surreal, a 2-year-old playing with you like one of her barbies, except you were smaller than those. The pressure under your arms down to your thighs held you immobile as she provided your locomotion. It was especially strange to feel, but not see your legs hit the ground, your knees just barely able to bend underneath the titan toddler's grip. The whole time, butterflies fluttered in your stomach as your heart beat hard, but subdued, it was unlike anything you had experienced before. April and Emily had both played with you as well, though to varying degrees, but your current feeling was unique. As she toyed with your tiny self, you couldn't help stealing peeks at her only bit of modesty, her diaper. The nightlight provided you with enough of a glow to make out some details, and that garment was not beneath notice. Katie was so young, Emily was too, but she was only 3 years younger than you, not 5, and you knew her well. As your feet kissed her thigh, you marveled at how soft it was, and how warm too. You found yourself wishing that you had climbed her legs instead of her diaper when you had the chance.

Her jerky, forced march ended as she held you still in the pit of her lap, hemmed in by her legs and waist. As her fist loosened and pulled away from you, you fell to your knees before catching yourself, having been completely along for the ride. Standing on your own two legs, you looked up at her as she, with a finger to her lips, looked down.

"Waow, Dani weawwy sma'..."

It was difficult to make out her exact expression, you hoped it was friendly though as you whispered sarcasm under your breath. "Oh, you just noticed?"

The tyke leaned forward, temporarily shadowing you in her massive form. Pushing herself up on all her limbs, she unsteadily took to her feet, causing the mattress to slope inward where you lay. Scrambling to keep away from her feet, she giggled and cooed at your antics.

"Hee hee, Dani sma', Dani sma'..." She jumped lightly to her, but to you the trampoline springs caused you to shoot upwards, 10 feet at least, but only to you, though the air you caught the next jump dwarfed that.

You crashed into her socked foot first, feeling like an accordian as you compressed against it before the mattress broke your fall, and immediately shot you back up. This time you couldn't even guess how much air you got, until you saw the "ground" you were approaching begin to shrink as once more gravity caught up to you, leaving you with the realization you were within arm's reach of the bottom of her diaper! This was crazy dangerous, you had to get her attention!

"Katie! Katie, stop, sto-!"

It felt like a mountain collapsed on you. No, you realized, it was too soft, besides, you knew this feeling, but never on this scale. Sometimes while you were laying down April would jump on you, or sit on you, and this felt distinctly like the latter, but up to eleven-thousand.

You struggled to gasp in the air that was forced out of you, but you only caught a mouthful of fabric. Panicking, you tried flailing your limbs, but they too wouldn't budge. The unbelievable pressure relented slightly, then magnified, then repeated the process as the precocious 2-year-old bounced her butt up and down with glee, overjoyed at having a cribmate, only barely aware he was underneath her tushie.

Feeling something poking at her from underneath, she lifted off, and giggled at your flattened body. Peeling you off of the bed, she tossed you in-between her gently-enclosed hands, singing.

"Tiny Dan, tiny Dan, tiny Dan~!"

Your lungs screamed as your head felt like a basketball being passed around in practice. In the semi-darkness and the lack of circulation from suffering 10 tons of toddler, your vision struggled to clear as you were constantly shuffled between two rubbery, warm surfaces.

"K-Katie-ie-ie! S-sto-o-o-op!"

12111212222121221212212111112212122122.content:
As 3-year-old Megan lifted you free from the confines of her pull-up, a cacophony of thoughts rang in your head. April is worried about me? The girl who had denied me my very free will to use as a doll, and taking pleasure from it, was worried enough to admit that I was missing?
Not enough to say I had been shrunk, though.
That dissenting whisper in your mind opened a new string. I was just inside Megan's pull-up. Sure, I protested a bit, but...
Well, there was no place to hide.
Sure there was! She could've put me in the other room, hid me behind her back, but she dropped me in her pull-up even after I said no!
Not technically no...
Close enough!

Those thoughts raged against each other as a new one rose above the conflict.

Am I becoming too comfortable here?

In a lot of ways this was the best-case scenario. It seemed unbelievable to say that, living in a house with 4 girls, all younger than me, with most still struggling to master potty-training, and yet it was. They were kind and gentle, friendlier than most kids at school in fact. For some reason your Dad's words rang in your mind.
"Nothing worth having ever comes easy. If there's no struggle, there'll be no reward." As those words echoed, a familiar voice sounded from the waking world.

"Daniel? Daniel, are you OK? She's gone now."

You looked up Emily. The one who had the most influence in your tiny life, she was an ever-present influence since you had escaped April's clutches.

As you looked around at all of them, from Emily, your best friend, and the one responsible for where you currently sat. She broke her promise, but her sisters had been wonderful, so it was really for the best. Claire, the oldest. It was easy to think she was older than you, not only due to her massive size, but also her personality. She's used to taking care of those smaller and more helpless than herself, being the oldest, you concluded. Katie, the youngest. You were still just a little apprehensive around her for many reasons. She was massive enough to crush you, but was also the littlest. In addition to that, though Megan and Emily wore pull-ups, it was mostly for bedtime and the very rare accident, Emily sometimes even wore big girl panties, from what you heard, she just preferred the feel of pull-ups. Katie however, she needed her diapers. Despite all of that though, even she was an angel.
Finally, you looked to Megan, still holding you. The girl who had casually dumped you in the frontside of her pull-up, but even that you ultimately couldn't get mad at, as you knew her intent was good. You yourself emphasized how much you needed to be hidden, and so she did in the best way her 3-year-old mind could conceive.

Finally, your thoughts centered on what was before the sisters, before napping with Emily, before seeking out April, even. Why did you shrink?

You didn't have the faintest clue, except that the answer wasn't likely to be found here.

The girls were looking to each other nervously. Emily was about to scold Megan for putting you in her pull-up, before you spoke up.

"There's... Something that needs to happen."

Instantly, all of them leaned in. "What is it Daniel?" They all asked in their own ways. They were too young to help, you knew. But was it worth it?
12111212222121221212212111112212122122.title: Small Doubts and Tiny Ruminations

121112122221212212122121111122121221221.content:
The girls all gasped at your announcement. Emily was the first to recover, and she wasn't happy about it.

"Daniel, no! You can't, I brought you here to help you, you can't go back!" To emphasize her point she crawled forward, causing you to shrink back into Megan. You used to be able to handle her outbursts so well, it was the easiest thing to just pick her up and nuzzle her until she smiled...

"I wont let you, Daniel!" She reached out, causing you to flinch before you felt yourself snatched in a different direction.

"Emily, that's enough." Clair's soft, calming voice rang out above you, and you sighed. "I don't like the sound of it any more than you do, but Daniel is older than all of us, and he must have a reason for saying what he did." She looked down on you expectantly.

You breathed deep, and spoke up. "Clair's right, I'm not trying to get away from you, you guys are great, incredible even!"

"Then why are you trying to get away?" Emily asked heartbroken. It hurt your heart, but you persevered.

"I'm trying to get back to normal. I'm not meant to be this size, and as great as you guys are, one accident and..." You looked down. "Dani squishy!" Katie squeaked, clapping her hands, earning her a dark look from Emily.

"Once I'm big again, I'll sleep over every day that I can, I promise." You smiled, but Emily's face was still crestfallen.
"You can sleep over every day now...."

"Um... If you know who made you small, why not let us get them?"
"That's a very good idea, Megan!" Clair said diplomatically.

"Well, I don't know who made me small. That's why-"
"Then why do you want to go home?" Megan interrupted.
"Yeah! Why do you wanna go so bad, huh? Maybe I should just give you back to April!" Emily blew a raspberry.
"Bad Dani, Dani bad!" Katie giggled.

"I have to do something!" You roared, then covered your mouth. "Please..." Your voice cracked. "...I can't stay like this."

"You wont." Clair's reassuring voice sounded above you in her lap. "But we did promise to protect you, and letting you go back to your house with April and who knows what else is way too dangerous."

"I know, but I shrank there. It has to be something."
"Well... What if it's not? Didn't you hide in Emily's pullup to get here?" You flushed at that, at being reminded of not only being in Megan's just now, but Emily's as well, and at how Katie slapped her diaper and cooed. "My diapee next, Dani go in my diapee next!"

A finger gently touched your head, lifting it up. Clair's soft visage smiled down on you. "Just trust in us, OK Daniel? I do go to your same school, actually. Maybe it was something from there?"

Maybe it was, but then why did you shrink at home? Although the only person who would've been interested in shrinking you in the first place would be April, and she couldn't have done it, not with the way she was acting. Maybe it was a better shot than going home. You agreed.

"What! But you're gonna be gone all day! I want to play with Daniel!" Megan and Katie sounded off in agreement, and you sighed once more.

1211121222212122121221211111221212212211.content:
"...I actually really need to go to the bathroom." You revealed sheepishly. In all of the excitement, you hadn't noticed it, but you felt pressure at both ends now.

"Oh." Clair said simply. She already knew the toilet wasn't an option, it's not like they made them for shrunken people.

Megan raised her hand, and spoke up matter-of-factly. "Uh, Dani. You were just in my diaper, you can go in here, I don't mind." She offered, patting her pull-up.
Before you could react, Emily surged forward. "No, Daniel's my friend!" Thank you Emily! You thought. "He can go in my pull-up!" She snatched you out of Clair's lap and brought you to her chest, reaching another hand downwards.
Just as suddenly as the first time, Katie's soft, drool-covered hands grabbed at you in Emily's fist and began tugging. "No, my tuwn, Dani go in my diapee, it my tuwn!" She began to whine.

As the youngest and second oldest girls fought over their two-inch cousin to stuff him in their undergarments, Clair raised her hands to try to quell the fighting.

"H-hey, don't treat Daniel like that! I'm sure he appreciates the offers very much, but there is another place-"
"Yes, that sounds great, thank you Clair-"

Temporarily stopping the tug-of-war with Katie, Emily turned you to look at her. "Relax, I'm not gonna pee on you!" Katie began tugging again, smiling. "I might!" She said gleefully.

"Emily, listen-"
"Oh, I see!" She let go of you, causing Katie to tumble back, holding you tight to her chest. "You'll go in Megan's diaper but not mine, is that it!?"
"Emily, it's not like- I mean- No-"
"Fine!" She hiccuped. "Go pee in hers, I don't care! I hate you both!" Covering her eyes, her cries disappeared as she ran out of the room.
"Emily, no! Don't go!" Megan's voice cracked as well as she got up to chase after her direct older sister.

Returning to a seated position, Katie smiled down at you as she began pressing you into her belly to slide you past her waistband. Clair's hands blocked her as she picked her up to rest her on her lap.

She sighed, rustling Katie's hair and causing her to look up. You were too shaken by everything to be much of a conversationalist at the moment.
"Why Em and Meggy sad? It Katie tuwn for Dani diapee." She declared. Clair sighed again, and her breath reached you, snapping you out of your state. Looking up at her, she seemed so mature, but so tired. You couldn't help but think Clair was really cool in that moment.
Your thought was shattered by a familiar feeling, Katie's diaper swallowing you legs first, causing you to cry out.

"Hold on Katie." Her hand softly stopped your decent.
"But it my tuwn..." Katie whined again. "Dani in my diapee..."
"Daniel." You looked up at her expectantly. "I'm really sorry but... Do you mind?"
You blinked a few times. "In Katie's..."
"I mean there are other ways, you could test the toilet, but it'd be pretty dangerous, and gross to get you out if you fell in. Or you could use our old potty seat, but it hasn't been washed for a long time, so, you know, it has a bunch of girl pee and poop still. And if you go in your pants, then we have some doll clothes, but you'd be like Katie...."
If you didn't know her at all, you would've thought it sadism, or cruelty, outright manipulation. Since you did know her, you knew she was a mediator, a diplomat. She managed her three siblings with what most of the time looked like ease, the last minute a rare glimpse at how tired it really made the 5-year-old girl.
You had been in diapers before. Not that you should be getting used to it, but...
You nodded to Clair, and she smiled a thank you. Looking to an impatient Katie, you addressed the ready-to-rampage toddler.
"Katie. May I please use your diaper?"
"Dani go in my diapee?" The girl asked excitedly, all her impatience melted away.
"Yes... May I please 'go' in your diaper?" You asked again, started to squirm against your bowels.
An affirmative squeal of joy answered you as she all but yanked the diaper open (and nearly off) to allow her tiny cousin usage of her wearable latrine.

You're getting sick of being April's "baby."

April glared down at you. "No! You're my dolly now, and I can do what I want with you! But since you don't like this... Maybe you'll have more fun at Katie's house!"

Katie is April's best friend. They're almost exactly the same: they love to play dolls and they both don't like you. You've met Katie a few times, and each time it ended horribly. What will she do when she sees you're no bigger then her thumb?

April wraps her fingers around you tightly and bounds downstairs. You quickly glance out the window and see it's raining; great. April heads to the closet and gets out her raincoat, which is yellow, ornage and red and large shiny buttons. She puts on the raincoat with you still in her hand.

"Time to go in my pocket!" April says evilly. She unbuttons her raincoat pocket and drops you in, then snaps the button shut. You pull yourself up to the flap and peer though the hole. April pulls on her rubber ducky boots then quickly heads for the door, knocking you to the bottom of the pocket.

You lay in suspense, getting more scared by the minute as April skips along to Katie's house. Sometimes she pauses to jump in a puddle, which manages to soak you even though you're in her pocket. After a long walk, she makes it to her friend's house. You hear excited voices from above. The pocket you're in suddenly opens and a giant hand grabs you and takes you out. April raises you to Katie's face.

"Wow, what a cute dolly!" Katie squeals.

"It's not a doll, it's my brother!"

Katie peers at you, then she squeals again. "Wow, it is your brother! How did he get so small?"

"I don't know! I found him like this! But it doesn't matter! Let's play with him!"

The two girls dash towards Katie's room. What will they do to you?

1211221.content:
Trotting down the hall, Katie looks at you with wide eyes and an evil smirk. This is not a person you wanted to be shrunken around… Every time you’ve met Katie in the past, she teased and taunted you to no end. To top it all off, Katie was convinced it was the funniest thing in the world to force you to smell her feet. April wouldn’t object, she would just join in gleefully, pinning you down for Katie, and giggling every time she saw her little brother smell her best friend’s feet. That was how every meeting with Katie had gone.

(Third-person switch)

“Are those doll clothes that you have on him?” Katie asked as they both entered her room and closed the door. April plopped onto the floor cross-legged, her eyes fixed on the helpless little boy in her hand that knew her as ‘big sister’. The smirk on her face grew to a smile.
“Yeah… I put those on him before I came over here. You wanna play dress up with him again? It’s funny how he wiggles around!” April’s words were mischievous and she had to giggle a bit. Daniel squirmed at the sound of her laughs – it was hard to take. He didn’t want to be played with, firstly because with Katie around, playing would lead to torment. Secondly, his sister could be pretty mean as well, and together they were too much for him, even at his normal size.
“Kristen will be home soon, so we’d better hurry!” Katie remarked. Daniel knew Kristen – she was Katie’s older sister. She was eighteen years old, had long curly brown hair, and was fair-skinned with a pretty face. Kristen had babysat the three of them from time to time, but obviously she didn’t mind watching the two older girls harass the younger child. She had just sat on the couch and watched while the girls had picked on and teased Daniel all day. At their worst, when the girls had ganged up and pinned Daniel down to torment him with their feet in his face, Kristen had just watched and laughed from the couch. And once, when he had seen a method of escape though the door that led to his room, Kristen had cried out laughingly to Katie that Daniel was going to get away, so the girls pounced him again and he was pinned. Katie and April had taken turns sticking their feet in his face for a long time after that, and Kristen just sat there and let them, giggling occasionally when he struggled get out from under them.
Obviously Katie thought that if Kristen found out about a teeny Daniel, she would stop them from playing-with/torturing him. Daniel himself questioned whether Kristen would do anything to stop them even if she did find out.
“Stop! Please! I don’t wanna play dress up!” Daniel yelled from his sister’s fist, but his voice was puny, and the girls just pretended to not hear his plea. The grin tightened on April’s cheeks, and the silky-shirt he was wearing was pulled violently off of him, as were the pants.
“Go get all your doll clothes! Hurry!” Daniel’s older sister exclaimed. Katie complied, and during the next thirty minutes he was subjected unwillingly to a series of clothing changes, each one of the girls taking turns in picking out his new outfits. He was handed back and forth between the girls so many times he lost count, but he never got used to it. When they finally decided they were, he rested in Katie’s open palms, wearing only his shrunken underwear and a silky pair of red doll-pants. April handed Katie a piece of gum, and took one herself. They both looked down at him, smacking the gum in their mouths over and over.
“What now?” April asked.
1211221.title: Flashbacks and Doll Clothes

12112211.content:
Katie’s face grew into a large smile – to Daniel, it was a very ominous sign, and he knew exactly what it meant. Her hand pulled up the back of her pant leg, and she grabbed the rim of her sock. Slowly, she peeled the sock off of her soft, delicate foot, and as her smooth bare sole was revealed, April began to snicker.
“Oh, that’s mean!” April giggled. Daniel didn’t know what to do. He didn’t want to be pressed up to Katie’s humungous sole, or squeezed between her dainty toes. Even if they were soft and smooth and didn’t smell bad, they would be still be torture to him, and that humiliation was starting to drive him crazy! He didn’t WANT to be a helpless toy anymore!!
“Let me go!” Daniel screamed. He squirmed right and left, but Katie’s grip tightened around him, reducing his attempts to nothing. “Don’t do that to me! NO!” Katie stuck out her enormous tongue at him, grinning in defiance of his feeble struggles. She fully removed her sock, and she poised her foot so that the ball of it was facing Daniel. He looked helplessly at her wiggling toes, as she very slowly moved him and her foot closer to one another.
His sister had scooted around in front of Katie, to get a better view. She bit her bottom lip to keep from laughing as she pretended to be a news-reporter. “So how does it feel to be toe-tally da-feet-ed, Little Bro?” This was a common way for them to mock him when they forced him to smell their feet, but this time everything was too huge… The enormity of the position: the giant smirking faces of the girls, his big sister’s enthusiastic, ear-splitting voice, and the giant humiliating sole that was getting nearer by the moment… It was too much!!
But there was nothing Daniel could do, and the intensity of the situation overwhelmed him as he finally made contact, and was pressed between Katie’s fingers and the cool sole of her foot. The girls broke out in giggles! He was pressed harder for a moment, and when this extra pressure was relieved his decompressing lungs filled his nose with the smell of Katie’s foot. The smell wasn’t repulsive or bad – but the sight of her grinning face, and the knowledge that she was making him smell it, it was overwhelming. He tried to struggle and fight his way out, but instead the force of her hand again forced him to smell the humiliation.
“Like it or not, you have to smell it!” Katie triumphantly chirped.
12112211.title: Daniel = Sole Sniffer

121122111.content:
His mouth was completely covered by the rounded top of the ball of her foot – he couldn’t get any air through it. His nose was unobstructed however, and she held his head in that position tightly with her thumb and forefingers. Daniel, stuck in a terribly overpowering and huge version of Katie’s foot-smelling game, continued to struggle harder and harder. He could tell that Katie didn’t mind his increased struggling – the smirky grin on her face only got bigger, and her ring finger rhythmically pressed his chest into the soft ball of her foot, with no problem at all. The smell was forced in-and-out of his lungs, despite his struggles, and always through his nose.

“That must be a record for the smallest nose that ever smelled anything!” April grinned.

“Yeah, and I picked the perfect place for him to test out his little nose, didn’t I?” Katie replied. It was directed toward Daniel, to mock him. He couldn’t answer but continued to struggle. Of course, in response Katie made him take another large sniff.

To Daniel, Katie’s giant, soft barefoot didn’t ever have a repulsive or bad smell, and even at his current size he still didn’t think it was that bad. Katie didn’t know that however, and Daniel knew that Katie didn’t know. The constant smirking, the occasionally giggles, and the knowledge that she laughed because of the smell traveling through his nose was what got to little Daniel. Seeing Katie’s smiling face, smiling just because she was able to make him smell her giant foot… it was too much too take! Daniel struggled with everything he had – he didn’t budge. He then felt the same pressure on his chest and back compress him again, and when it went away he was forced to sharply inhaled the smell of Katie’s conquering foot - again. He saw her dominating smirk and heard both girls giggle.

Just then, the phone rang. April ran to go get it, and came back with it to give it to Katie. Katie took the phone, and answered it.

12112212.content:
Before the girls could think of anything else to do with tiny Daniel, in front of them the door to the room swung open and in walked Kristen, nonchalantly. Katie, not realizing that Kristen had returned home during their game of “dress up” with Daniel, wasn’t quite prepared to hide Daniel if someone walked in the room. Although she did quickly clasp her hands around him, Kristen had already caught a glimpse of what the girls were so intently staring at when she walked in the door.
“What was that?” Kristen questioned her younger sibling. She felt that it obviously was something she wasn’t supposed to have or she wouldn’t have hidden it so fast.
“Nothing!” Katie replied. This only furthered Kristen’s suspicions, of course, so she walked up closer to her younger sister, on the floor in front of her and crossed her arms.
“Don’t be a Smart Ass! Open your hands and show me what you have in there!” Every one was startled, including little Daniel, by her choice of words and tone of voice. Kristen hadn’t had an easy day at school, and work wasn’t any better. She wasn’t going to put up with any nonsense from her little sister as soon as she got home. It was an odd tone for her to take with anyone, but she had already had enough! She didn’t even care that they had company over either.
Katie was so startled that she forgot about the possible consequences of showing April’s teeny Daniel to her own big sister Kristen. She opened her hands up and held him up for her angry older sister to see, and the reaction that Kristen had was probably what anyone would expect…
GASP! “What in the WORLD! It’s a tiny little boy…!??” Kristen was speechless after that.
“It’s Daniel…” April spoke up and quietly said. “I found him like that this morning, and I brought him over here to play.” April didn’t know what to expect, really. She figured she’d be in trouble once her mommy found out that she’d played with her little brother instead of helping him, and she figured that Kristen would tell.
“DANIEL…!??” Kristen was still quite confused, and very shocked, but she still had the calmness to pick Daniel out of her sister’s hands and hold him up to her own face. Daniel didn’t know what to expect either. He didn’t trust Kristen, ever since she let the older girls harass him when she babysat them, but maybe she would see this as an entirely different situation and get him some kind of help. In any case, her giant, pretty face and large, bugged-out eyes filled his whole vision for the moment, and he could only wait to see what she would do.

“Well, this is what you get for shrinking yourself!” Kristen’s penetrating voice condemned. Daniel could not believe his ears – she thought he had done this to himself! What was wrong with her! “I know how you are, you know… Every time I’ve been your babysitter, I’ve seen how you let these two girls pick on you and play with you, and even let them stick their feet in your face when they pin you down. I did always think it was cute how you’d pretend you weren’t letting them do it, until they had you in a position where you couldn’t get away even if you wanted to! I thought it was even more adorable however; that you liked it until you were completely stuck under the two of them… then you’d change your mind! Isn’t that’s what’s happened this time too, little Daniel?”

Did she really believe that he was just letting the older girls push him around, and that he wasn’t really fighting back? If that was the case all along, then she must have thought that he liked it! How awful! “I didn’t – ” he was cut off as Kristen’s giant, soft hand clasped around him up to his nose. He couldn’t speak at all; he could do nothing but stare at Kristen’s humungous, pretty face. She paused for a moment, and ran her hand through her long curly brown hair.

“Now that you’ve shrunk yourself so that April and Katie would play with you, you’ve changed your mind and want to be big again!” Kristen continued. Daniel tried to shake his head ‘no’, but there was no use – he couldn’t do anything but helplessly stare at his captor’s huge face. “Guess what Daniel? You’ve got yourself stuck under the *three* of us this time! I don’t think we should have mercy on you… I’d rather have fun; you put yourself here, anyway. And we’ll teach you a lesson you won’t forget, so that you don’t ever do this again – if you ever DO get big again, that is!” Daniel felt that the situation was much more awful for him now that it had been before… now they were going to PUNISH him, and for a REASON!

121122222212.content:
After April starts crying and throws the knife, slicing into the wall near the door. She jumps up and runs off to the bathroom across the hall, Katie follows her. They come back with a box of band-aids and a tube of antibacterial Neosporin cream. April looks over your body and sees that she didn't cut too deep. She takes a little dab, about 1/16th of a penny's size, so April and Katie can hardly see it, but it fills your cuts completely.

After the cream has been applied she gets out a medium bandage, and unwraps it to put on your wounds. "These will have to do" said April as she wrapped them around your arm and leg. The bandage wraps around your arm a little more than 6 times, it was a pretty short band-aid too. It's width went from your shoulder to your elbow. And your thigh to the middle of your kneecap. Around the leg the bandage wrapped a little over 5 times. They put you in Katie's bed and they leave the room and watch TV for a few hours. When they come check on you, you don't feel pain when they touch your wounds, but they leave the bandages on.

They put you on the floor to see if you can walk. You pathetically limp toward them. They were just about to put you back on the bed when Katie's mother comes home, they immediately jumped up and ran to keep her from going into Katie's room. Their steps were like earthquakes as they left. After a couple minutes you sit down on the floor, still amazed at how big everything is to you. Then a shadow comes around the corner of the door. You stand up expecting Katie or April.

You instead find Katie's 10-month-old brother, Chris, crawling through the house. You could still hear them trying to distract Katie's mom as Chris starts crawling toward you. You hide inside of the dollhouse a couple feet away (really inches but to you they seemed like feet) and hoped he didn't find you. Chris saw you move into the dollhouse so he crawls straight toward you. "Do I just stand here and accept my fate--" your thought was interrupted when Chris grabs you in his hands and doesn't even bother to look at you and crawls back to his room. There was a plush ramp leading up to his crib. Chris almost drops you, so he quickly catches you, as he does this the ramp falls over, removing your chance to escape when you get the chance. After getting settled in, Chris sits down and puts you in between his legs and just stares at you. You stare back at his soft face, with the thin blonde hair, and Hazel eyes.

Chris hears his sisters trying to keep their mom from coming down the hallway into Katie's room, "I'm just checking on Chris. I'm not looking in your room." she laughs. Right as his mom goes through the doorway you look toward the doorway and you feel jerked and then in pitch black. You apparently were quickly grabbed by Chris and thrown in his diaper, the only hiding spot closest to him. You feel it's for the best to not try to crawl out since you have some healing wounds. When Chris's mom walks over, she notices the ramp which has fallen over and she thought she would pick it up when she leaves. She sits next to Chris, picks him up and puts him on her lap, and asks if he needs a diaper change. He cutely shakes his head "no". She checks the front and back of his diaper (you were out of sight in the bottom) and she patted him on the head, "Good boy, Chris." She puts him back into the crib and is immediately talked to by Katie and April, who didn't check Katie's room to make sure You were there.

After Chris's mom leaves she turns off the light expecting him to go to sleep. She also forgot about the ramp, still keeping Daniel's escape impossible. Immediately you see light, as Chris searches for you in his diaper. He fails to see you the first time (not surprising since his mom didn't see you either) and searches his crib. He even looks down so far, he's looking in between his legs and losing balance and falls into a cartwheel. He sits up a little dazed. But he soon gains back his balance, stands up, pulls the diaper down a little, and spots you. He takes you out and drops you in front of him. He pulls his diaper back up and sits with his legs in a circle around you to block off your escape. Chris begins staring at you again. You feel a little creeped out because he had a slight grin on his face.

You don't feel like staring back, so you say "Hi." Chris just sits there and does nothing. You creep toward his feet, hoping you could muster up the strength to separate them. He then grabs you and puts you on his stuffed bear next to his pillow. It's actually quite comfortable. You instantly fall asleep from this event-filled day. You wake up to find yourself slightly shorter. By about 5/50ths of an inch. No one else would notice it, but at your current height, every 50th of an inch is completely noticeable. You aren't quite awake yet though. You don't have any light on you, so you figure it's still night time. When your eyes adjust, you see Chris staring at you again, from right in front of the bear. You look over to the clock next to his crib-- it reads 12 noon. You can hear Katie and April (who eventually spent the night) searching Katie's room, most likely for you. You would rather be with someone who will actually help your situation, rather than be stared at all day by a baby.

Chris was actually pretty cute. Like most babies are. A couple minutes pass, Chris turns around for a minute to look at some toys to play with. Right when he turns around you leap toward the night table. (a couple inches in reality but about the width of a house) once you come short you begin to realize your mistake. As it seems from your point of view you are about to hit the ground, it turns out to be soft, not carpet like at all. When you look down you see a pasty white hand under you. Chris saved you from certain doom. You suddenly thought about your wounds. They were starting to hurt for some reason. You're certain it was just from the instant leap. Chris pulls you back up into the crib and just as you think he is going to stare at you again...
