Of course having a nice soft bed of blubber didn’t hurt much either. The boy had to admit, it felt unbelievable to be surround by her warm, soft, protective little girl fat. It was like sleeping on a nice big water bed, something he always had enjoyed in the past the few times he was able to sleep on one. He could easily get used to this.

He looked up at his bunk mate. She slept with a smile on her pudgy face, extenuating her slight double chin, and she was letting out a few quite and cute snores that he found strangely soothing. He could see her long, middle-parted, blonde hair still looked great, even after 8 hours of sleeping.

He grinned at this sight. To him, she looked extremely cute like this. Despite his hears, he was beginning to be quite taken with this chubby young giantess. She didn’t seem to be the monster he had expected. She was sweet and caring and didn’t seem too horrified at him being so small.

It was then he saw Mary’s brown eyes open with a slow flutter. It took her a few seconds to remember why there was a little boy the size of one of her dolls on the part of her belly that her shirt and pants just couldn’t cover. She grinned happily as she looked down at him.

“Morning Daniel. Did you sleep okay?” She asked him.

He nodded to her with a grin taking his face as well.

“Yep. Your tummy was nice and warm and soft…” He quickly covered his mouth after he said that last word.

He was now very scared again. He didn’t want to insult this girl with brining up her weight. He didn’t have a problem with it. Truth be told, he actually was starting too really like the fact she was so fat. However, he didn’t know how Mary would feel about it.
1411111222112112121121222211112.title: Still asleep

choices: “I eat a LOT of food and shrunken people, but not you”
14111112221121121211212222111121.content:
The little one just giggled at his reaction.

“Awww, don’t worry Daniel. I bet my big tummy is extra soft.” She replied a bit proudly, lightly tapping her tummy, sending small ripples through the fat.

Daniel giggled as he felt the little girl’s blubber bounce around him. It didn’t hurt him at all and actually felt pretty fun to him. He grinned back up at her, now seeing she didn’t mind herself being fat. In fact, Daniel was even a bit happy she liked being chunky and, from what he seen from last night, liked to eat. Although he didn’t know why he liked it so much.

Mary grinned back at him. She was glad she didn’t hurt him, but even more thrilled he didn’t seem bothered by how plump she was. She decided to take it one step further, just to see what would happen.

“Wanna get some breakfast. I don’t know about you, but I’m STARVING!” she asked him.

Daniel just grinned at the idea. Not only was he hungry, but he REALLY wanted to see Mary pack away the food. He nodded vigorously to her in reply.

The little girl grinned happily at his reaction. She too was extremely smitten with the cute little boy she found and was more than happy to see he wanted to watch her stuff herself. She giggled a little as she took Daniel out of her belly and into her hand. She held him out so he could see both her face and her large kid belly.

“Okay, we’ll get some breakfast then. Although I gotta warn you…”
14111112221121121211212222111121.title: She likes it

choices: Do you risk your life to sneak some bites of that waffle?
Or would you rather wait until Mary finishes?
141111122211211212112122221111211.content:
You grin while saying excitedly, "You know what they say! 'The more, the merrier!'" Mary happily walks to the kitchen and places you on the kitchen table. Mary started to prepare her breakfast feast, she went into the freezer and took out six frozen waffles and put them in a toaster oven and set the timer. While this was happening, she got a chair and pushed it against the cabinet, making a loud noise that nearly blew out your eardrums, and climbed up to get a bowl and a cup and placed them next to you. This bowl was enormous, even at your height! She pushed the chair again, this time to a pantry, making another loud, irritating, scraping noise to your displeasure, while she climbed up and got a box of cereal. She jumped down and started pouring the cereal out. The corn flakes tumbled into her bowl like an avalanche of flaky, sugary boulders. She then went into the fridge and pulled out a gallon jug of milk, and a large carton of orange juice. Out came the milk like a white waterfall into an ocean of corn flakes. On your opposite side, the cup quickly changed from a translucent clear glass, to a solid orange. The timer on the toaster oven rang and Mary pranced over to the toaster oven where she retrieved her waffles and put them all on a plate in front of you. The waffles looked like a skyscraper to where you stood! Mary walked to the pantry and got out some syrup and covered the waffles in the gooey, brown liquid. Mary got out a fork, knife and spoon from the silverware drawer and placed them beside her plate. Finally, she pushed the enormous, very loud, and very annoying chair to the table and hopped up onto it. You couldn't believe your eyes! This crazy girl was about to eat six waffles drenched in syrup, a gigantic bowl filled to the brim with cereal and milk, and on top of that, a tall plastic glass of OJ. As Mary jumped to pull herself into the table, the young giantess's face appeared above the tower of waffles. No wonder she was so chunky!

"Told you I eat a lot of food." she grinned at you.

"No kidding!"

"Well? Are you ready? Because my tummy's ready!"

"Go ahead!"

As soon as you said that, Mary started shoveling in masses and masses of the cereal. She chewed with lightning speed before swallowing heavily. She briefly paused to breathe before plunging back into the bowl of cereal. As she completed a few more cycles of this, your own stomach started growling. Watching a pudgy girl engorge herself was starting to make you hungry. You suddenly remember that, aside from last night's snack, the last time you ate anything was yesterday morning! As Mary was just about halfway done with her cereal, you start eying the massive waffles in front of you. The moist top was dripping rivers of syrup and was glistening like honey in the sunlight. You mentally slap yourself. You can't just walk up there and eat some of the waffles! Those were Mary's! You argued with yourself that you were small enough to have your fill before she found out. You also realize that with the way she's eating the cereal, she probably won't notice you helping yourself to some breakfast and help herself to add you to her breakfast. While you adored that soft, blubbery belly, you had no intentions to see what it was like on the inside. Your stomach was growling angrily and Mary's ravenous eating wasn't helping at all.
141111122211211212112122221111211.title: BIG Breakfast!

1411111222112112121121222211112111.content: You abandon every ounce of common sense in your body and gave in to your hunger as you climbed onto the plate. It was a little hard to walk as you trudged through the pools of syrup. You start munching on the soft, chewy waffles. You get a bit carried away as you start climbing into the waffle. After you had your fill, you start crawling to what you think is a side. The stacked waffles on top of you are starting to get a bit heavy. As you peer out, you see that Mary had just finished slurping down the milk from her bowl, and you got a strong feeling that she wasn't going to drink her orange juice next. Before you know it, a giant knife cuts away the waffles to your left. You can't move because of the weight of the waffles and that you're frozen in awe as the fork quickly rose to Mary's mouth. "I didn't know you can fit six waffles on one fork!" The most waffle pieces you ever had at one time was two! You try to struggle out, but before you realize it, you are deposited up into Mary's gaping mouth. You roll out of the waffles just to avoid being bitten in half. You try to cry out to Mary to let you out, but before you can even catch your breath, Mary's tongue flips you and the chewed-up waffle down her throat. You are pushed down her esophagus relatively slowly, but your thoughts are cut short by an opening underneath you as you fall face first into Mary's stomach. You fall is broken by a combination of chewed waffles, corn flakes, and milk. Surprisingly, there was no stomach acid. Well, not yet. As soon as you try to get up, more chewed up waffles are falling on your back. They start piling up. You couldn't tell because it was pitch black inside the stomach, but you were close to the top of her stomach and more was still coming in. You think to yourself, How could one little girl eat so much? You struggle a bit, but you find that you are able to move. Maybe if you can find the stomach wall, you can bang on it to tell her that you're in her stomach, or at the very least, give her indigestion and throw you up. You valiantly start crawling forward. Did you make it to the wall?
1411111222112112121121222211112111.title: Part of a not-so-balanced breakfast!

choices: Mary feels something poking inside her belly.
14111112221121121211212222111121111.content: By some miracle, you hit a moving wall. That could only mean that you had reached the stomach wall. You dig up a bit so your entire body is facing the wall. Then you start frantically punch and kick the wall as hard as you can. You can only hope that you can be felt by Mary.
14111112221121121211212222111121111.title: You made it!

14111112221121121211212222111121112.content:
The weight of Mary's massive breakfast was proving to be too much. Even though the stomach wasn't vibrating as much as you thought it should, you still can't reach the wall. You start to cry and realize that you never should've left Jenny. At least Jenny would never eat you on purpose. Of course, Mary didn't know you were there... You eventually pass out under the weight of the chewed food on top of you. At least you weren't awake to feel yourself finally being digested.

=================================================================

Mary gulped down the last of the orange juice and it landed in her belly with a massive burp. She catches her breath and asked, "That was a big one, wasn't Daniel?" There wasn't an answer. "Daniel?" she called out. The only thing she heard was her own stomach. "Daniel?" She looked under the bowl and plate and called again. She starts to think aloud, "Where could he be? He was on the table when I last saw him." A realization hits her, "He wasn't in my food, was he? If he wasn't anywhere in the kitchen, and not on the table?" She gasped. "Daniel!" She was yelling to her belly, but to no avail. "Daniel!" Mary broke into tears, but then she loudly belched again. Her focus shifted from you to her now bulging stomach. Mary shrugged. "Oh well, at least he tasted yummy." Mary walked into the living room to take a nap.

==================================================================

Epilogue:

Your family noticed you were missing, but gave up in a few days of searching. Jenny was severely depressed and vowed never to have a boyfriend again, which she eventually broke and named her first child after you. Lisa couldn't care less about you, but her boyfriend mysteriously disappeared three months later... Mary, had indigestion for a week before finally passing through her system. She still eats a lot, but she's a lot more careful about what she eats now...
14111112221121121211212222111121112.title: You're doomed to be breakfast...

choices: Mary suggests a game to play.
1411111222112112121121222211112112.content:
...but it's a boring one. You sit down as you watch Mary slurp down all the contents of her bowl. She then picks up the fork and knife and starts eating the waffle. You are given a front-row seat as she stabs the waffle with her fork as she cuts a piece around it, and she brings the fork to her mouth with all six identical pieces still on the fork. You didn't even know that you could fit that much on one fork! Mary takes a slightly longer time to chew all that food, but she eventually swallows hard. You could barely make out a lump traveling down her neck and disappeared at her chest line. The more she eats, the better you can see the swallowed lump. Dang! You say in your head, She could probably swallow a hamster whole and not even flinch! Finally, she finished the waffles and started gulping down her glass of orange juice. The orange drink started flowing out of the cup into her mouth and down her throat. She finished drinking the orange juice and gave a burp that was the loudest burp you had ever heard. You were speechless as you shifted from Mary's smug grin and her massive belly, now even more massive. "Well?" she asked, "what do you think?"

You find some words as your gaze was fixed on Mary's belly. "Wow, I can't believe you ate all that food."

"Well, believe it! *burp* Wasn't that the most amazing thing you ever saw?"

"Well... yeah. How did you learn to eat all of that, that fast?"

"Lots and lots of *belch* practice!"

You look around at the plate. There was barely a crumb on the plate left, which was okay because you don't like the syrup-covered waffle crumbs. You looked in the bowl and there wasn't a drop left. Mary started to realize something. "Oops! I forgot to *burp* make you breakfast, didn't I, *belch* Daniel?" You nodded. Mary jumped down from the chair and pulled out a slice of bread from the fridge. She broke off a loop and handed it to you, while she tossed the rest into her mouth.

"Sorry, I don't like the crust." You say. Mary peels off the crust and throws it in her mouth too. "Thanks." you say.

"No problem."

"So, do you do this every morning?

"Yep." she explained proudly. "My mommy works really late at night and doesn't get home until 12 'o clock. So until then, it's my own personal all-you-can-eat buffet!" She carried you to the living room where she laid on the floor and unbuttoned the lowest button on her PJ's, revealing her bulging midsection.

You were standing on Mary's soft, warm, and blubbery belly that was actively working to digest that mammoth meal that she just ate. "So, your mom doesn't come home that often?"

"No, not really."

"So you don't get a lot of friends, do you?" you ask her.

"No." Mary said sadly. She lifted her head to look at you. You were too preoccupied with her massive stomach to notice her sparkly blue eyes, her freckles and her flowing dirty blonde hair before, but now she looked stunning! "Would you like to be my friend?" she asked.

"Yeah, I would like that." When she heard that, Mary sighed and relaxed.
1411111222112112121121222211112112.title: Patience is a virtue...

choices: See how much more I can eat before lunch
14111112221121121211212222111121122.content:
Mary lit up as she heard his reply. He could tell that this girl probably didn’t get a whole lot of fan fair from the other kids she knew. After all, she ate tons of food and wasn’t the skinniest child to say the least. Of course it probably didn’t help matters much that she liked being that way. Still, Daniel was happy to be the sweet and very pretty (at least in his eyes) chubby girl’s friend.

“Oh, thank you Daniel! I really wanna be your friend too.” She said as she quickly hugged him against her bloated little girl belly.

Unfortunately for the little boy, this tubby 7 year old was hugging him just a tad too tight. He was being squished up against her big fat belly to the point where it felt like he was going to pass right through the wall of cellulite and join her massive breakfast. However, as uncomfortable as this was a part of him was really enjoying being so close to this much fat kid blubber, so he let the little girl finish her hug without interrupting.

After a few moments, she let him go, and the little boy was not only able to let out a slight sigh of relief, but get a nice big glimpse of the belly he were standing on. It was so much bigger than last night. The little sliver of fat that couldn’t be covered had grown to almost half her belly. He could also see, even while standing on top of her belly, that it stuck out a good 5-6 inches from her frame. It even completely covered the lower portion of her, concealing what needed to be concealed to keep her modesty.

“Wow!....” Was all he could say at the sight.

“Yep. My tummy’s always extra fat after my big breakfast.” Mary giggled lightly at her gluttony before an idea hit her.

“Hey, I got a little game we could play.” She said grinning mischievously.
14111112221121121211212222111121122.title: Mary suggests a game to play.

choices: You rest on top of Mary's tummy.
141111122211211212112122221111211221.content:
You start grinning. "What kind of game?"

Mary let out a huge burp. "You hear that? That means there's still room in my tummy. Let's see how much it will take to fill it up before lunch!

You were surprised and eager at the same time. "Really? You still want more?"

"What part of there's still room in my tummy don't you get?" Mary slapped her distended gut on each word to emphasize. Each time, her belly fat rippled like a wave pool at your favorite water-park. It felt really fun sitting on it while it was rippling. Mary belched again. "Come on, Danny!"

You like the fact that she's giving you a cute nickname (even if Danny is a common nickname for someone named Daniel), just like your brother's girlfriend does to him! You try to focus your attention away from that awful subject and back to your own friend who retrieved a whole bag of marshmallows. Each one was as big as you were! "All right! Start grabbing marshmallows and toss them into my mouth!" You grab a marshmallow and hold it high over your head. It's much lighter than it looks. You then threw it down Mary's cavernous mouth where it disappeared down her throat. Mary looked like she was enjoying this. "Come on Danny, faster!" You start tossing marshmallows in like there's no tomorrow. Mary grabs a handful of marshmallows and swallows them down, too. Before you know it, you've run out of marshmallows. "Oops! Out of marshmallows!" She grins and get out another bag, this time filled with gummy bears the size of regular teddy bears. "All right Danny, start throwing them!" You grab one, and it sticks to your hand a bit. Mary pulls it off of you and tosses it into her mouth. "Sorry, why don't you sit this one out?" You sit on her collarbone as she dumps the bag of gummy bears into her mouth and swallows hard. You can feel them going down her throat underneath you. Mary finally gets a bunch of bananas. She peels one and cuts it in half. She scarfs down one half and the other. She does this with the other bananas until she lies down and belches loudly. "Well, I think that's it Danny. I am completely full."

"Wow..." you're amazed at how big her belly is now. You can't even begin to describe it.

"Yep, I'm going to take a nap now. Wake me up when it's lunch time, best friend." With that, Mary fell asleep. You got on top of her. You could feel her stomach working overtime to digest that huge meal, even for this chubby kid's standards, it was huge. While she's asleep, you are eager to start exploring, but you're still pretty tired. Maybe Mary has the right idea?
141111122211211212112122221111211221.title: The eating game!

choices: What crazy antics await at breakfast?
141111122211211212112122221111212.content:
...

She eats...

Shrunken PEOPLE?!?

You were paralyzed with fear when she said that. You had some relief that she said she won't eat you... but you still felt kind of uneasy about her eating other people like you. And how long would it be before she changes her mind about you?

"Daniel? Are you okay? You don't look all right. Is something wrong?" Mary asked.

"No, nothing's wrong." You lie to her. "Let's go to breakfast."
141111122211211212112122221111212.title: “I eat a LOT of food and shrunken people...

choices: He had a crush on her too
He didn’t have a crush on her too
1411111222112112121121222211112121.content:
Daniel was starting to get scared again. He didn’t want to end up a snack for the tubby little girl. He could just picture it now: she’d gobble him up after a nice big breakfast of pancakes, toast, bacon and a side of little people. I mean if he had to guess whether she’d be more inclined to eat someone or not eat someone, her gluttony last night and tubby physique told the answer would be a resounding YES!

However, another part of the shrunken child was, well…excited about the idea of not only seeing Mary stuff her cute young face with food, but also with people. Not that Daniel wanted to be mean, but the first part of his fantasy was alright with him, he just didn’t like the ending.

It was at this point his thoughts were broken. Mary had been carrying him downstairs gently in her had. However she quickly stopped before reaching the kitchen. She saw how scared the boy looked. She knew what was making him so fearful. She quickly did her best to belay his fears.

“Don’t worry Danny….” She said both lovingly and soothingly. “I wouldn’t dream of eating you down. You’re FAR too handsome for that.”

It was now Mary’s turn to blush at what had just slipped out of her mouth. Like Daniel last night, she was horribly embarrassed at what she had just told him. You see the tubby young giantess was getting a bit of a crush on the boy. Heck, it was part of the reason she first brought the cute shrunken child back with her.

Daniel blushed a bit too and told her…
1411111222112112121121222211112121.title: What crazy antics await at breakfast?

choices: Mary asks, "Why don't you feel the same way I do?"
What was that about your name on the menu, again?
14111112221121121211212222111121212.content:
To be honest, you were starting to like this girl, too. But, adding to the fact that she may "accidentally" drop you in her waffles, you're afraid that she might get attached to your current state. You don't want to stay like this forever! So you swallow your fear and reply, "I'm sorry, but I don't think that this will work out very well..."

You could practically feel her heart breaking when she heard you say that. "What?"

"Well, you see, with how short I am..."

"Oh, I get it..." she said, fighting back tears.

"Oh, no, please don't..."

"Oh, no, it's okay, I'm fine. I'll just go start breakfast." Mary set you down on the table and left to make her normal breakfast. Well, that worked out brilliantly. You might as well write your name on her menu, now. Minutes pass as Mary placed her breakfast down next to you. It wasn't as big as you had hoped... you guess that she's too depressed to stuff herself (an interesting sentiment)... As she chews her food, she stares longingly at you. In about thirty seconds Mary finished. Filling to a normal person, but probably didn't even leave a dent in her massive tummy. She then gently grabs you and brings you up to her face.
14111112221121121211212222111121212.title: Her heart's not all that will break...

choices: Then she smiled. "I knew you had a crush on me!"
"You're just like everyone else. I don't know what I saw in you."
141111122211211212112122221111212121.content:
You breathed a quick sigh. This is your last chance to keep yourself from becoming an appetizer, so you better think hard about what to say! "Um, well. It's not that I don't like you... but, I'm still a little scared."

Mary replies, "Scared? Why?"

You hesitate. "Well, before I met you, well, before you met me, there where other people who were really mean to me. And just because I was small, too! When I heard you eat small people, I was scared that you would gobble me up the first chance you had."

"You don't trust me?"

"Well, If I had to guess if you'd be inclined to eat someone or not to eat someone, with a tummy as big as yours, I'd have to guess 'yes.' "

"So you don't like me because I'm fat?"

You gulp. I bet you looked real delicious to her right now.

"No, no, no! I actually like you being fat. I like how soft it when I rest on it. I like how unworried you are with how big it is! So, can you forgive me?"

Mary frowned for a while...
141111122211211212112122221111212121.title: Your final trial!

choices: "If you really want to, just don't let me see you do it, okay?"
"Sorry Mary, but I just can't let you do that."
1411111222112112121121222211112121211.content:
You sighed in relief. "Your heart is as big as your stomach, Mary." Mary blushed furiously, and hugged you tightly. She might have been pressing you too tightly against her belly fat, but you were starting to appreciate it, since you weren't going inside it.

"Well, now that we're friends again Danny, I'm still hungry." Mary said.

"Actually, I want to talk to you about that." You reply, now confident with your newfound trust in her. "I still feel kinda weird that you're eating small people. It just doesn't feel right."

"Well, don't feel bad, I'm just getting back at all the meanies that made fun of me."

"By eating them?"

"What better way to get back at them for making fun me by filling my tummy with them?"

"Still, doesn't it seem a bit...extreme?"

"Okay, I can take a hint. You're obviously upset that I'm eating tiny people like you, so I'll go along with whatever you decide." You reply...
1411111222112112121121222211112121211.title: That was close!

choices: Mary prepares some little people for her next course
Mary prepares some normal food before the little people
14111112221121121211212222111121212111.content:
Daniel thought about it for a moment. He still wasn’t sure if he wanted to see her eating other shrunken people. I mean he wasn’t a bully or anything. He didn’t want to see people getting hurt.

However, another part of him told him two things. The first being that he liked this chubby child more than just a friend even if she did eat people. The second thing, the one he was only now starting to really think about, was part of him DID actually want to see her eat down some of these people. I mean he might not have been a bully, but the people she was eating certainly were. He was picked on so much and knew the kids who made fun of this sweet plump child didn’t feel sorry about it and weren’t going to stop. Not only was Mary helping get back at them and making the school yard a bit better for everyone else, but she was also adding to her tubby young tummy. Something Daniel couldn’t deny he loved.

With these thoughts, his mind was made up. He looked up at Mary and said,

“I guess if you’re eating bullies down, you can go ahead. I don’t even mind if you eat them in front of me.” He replied to the girl

“But PLEASE, Mary. I don’t wanna make you wanna eat me.” He said, a bit of the fear from before in his voice.

Mary looked on at him happily. She was so glad he was okay with one of her favorite snacks. However, her happiness quickly dropped as he heard what he said after his first sentence. She thought for a moment about what he could be referring to before it hit her.

“Y-you thought I was going to eat you before? No, no! I wasn’t going to eat you. I would NEVER eat you Daniel. I Love you!” She said as she hugged him against her belly.

Daniel couldn’t help but grin as he was again pushed against her soft belly. He could only reply,

“I love you to, Mary” More than happy she wanted to be more than just friends too and REALLY happy she wasn’t thinking of him as her next snack.
14111112221121121211212222111121212111.title: "If you really want to...

choices: Do you and Mary have some game you want to play?
Or would you rather just chat?
14111112221121121211212222111121212112.content:
Mary sighed in disappointment. "Fine. I'll respect your decision, only because I love you." Her stomach growled in disapproval. She picked you up and placed you in the pantry. "So, why don't you find yourself something to eat? You must be starving!" You have no room to protest as she set you down inside the pantry. You decide to find something that will fulfill your appetite. You search for a couple minutes when you find what you want. Saltine crackers! You push the crackers off the pantry and Mary walks over and picks the both of you up. You get set down on the table and Mary opens the bag. You walk up and pull out a cracker that's just about as big as you are, then Mary pulls out three and placed them in her mouth. As you nibbled on your cracker, you noticed a jar that was on the table that you hadn't noticed before. The lid was on the table and... does it have air holes? You glanced back at Mary. As she kept shoveling in more and more crackers, you could see her stomach bump, just very subtly...

"Um, Mary? What's this jar? Were there people in here?"

Mary was caught off guard. "Um...no?"

You were getting more skeptical. "Did you eat all those people that were in there?"

"I don't know what *urp* you're talking about."

"Mary, I thought you said you wouldn't eat any more people!"

Mary had a sheepish look on her face. "Well, it's not like I could just let them go! If I did, they would just be smashed under someone's shoe, or eaten by some bug. If they're just going to be eaten in the end, why shouldn't they feed a nice, cute little girl?"

You sigh. "I suppose I'll let you get away with it this one time."

Mary smiles at you and says, "You're the best Danny!" She goes on to stuff herself with the crackers. You gaze at her belly one more time. You felt bad that the people inside had to suffer, but at least they met their end helping a growing young girl. You did like to watch her stuff herself. You just couldn't wait for her to get too comfortable with you. She may come up with some...original games... You shrug that thought away and continue eating your cracker.
14111112221121121211212222111121212112.title: Turned over a new leaf?

1411111222112112121121222211112121212.content:
Oh crap. You don't like where this is headed. "In fact, I think I'll show you what I do to people who make fun of my belly!" Her stomach growled in anticipation.

"No, NO! Please, don't eat me Mary!"

At this point, Mary was flat out ignoring you as she dropped you in her mouth and swished her tongue around you, savoring your taste (or lack thereof). After a few moments, you are pushed to the back of her throat and quickly swallowed. You were screaming your head off the entire time. In no time at all, you fall in Mary's stomach with a plop.

"You might have been handsome Danny, but you were even more tasty..."
1411111222112112121121222211112121212.title: Failed your Persuade check...

141111122211211212112122221111212122.content:

info.description:
You're Daniel, an average 7 year old boy. You decide to take a quick nap in your room. But when you wake up, things have changed... You're only 2 inches tall! At first you think this is great, but then you realize just how dangerous being small can be...

I've rated this story R so I won't delete much. Don't kill Daniel. Don't end the story, keep it going. If you read please add and rate. Enjoy!
